name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Tyler South

reviews.text: I have stayed at the Holiday Inn Express South in Tyler, Texas many times over the past three years, and it has always been one of the best hotels in the Holiday Inn Express chain.
reviews.title: Good Hotel

reviews.text: Unfortunately, this hotel has slipped a little in my estimation. I was told that there is a new management company running the hotel, and it was evident to me. There was no longer an evening "business social hour" as in the past with snacks, beer and wine. Also, the breakfast buffet was similar but not as fresh as in the past. Hopefully, these are just growing pains with the new management company, and this Holiday Inn Express will return to the high standards of the past.
reviews.title: Acceptable stay but nothing outstanding

reviews.text: Iwould recommend this hotel to both business and leisure travelers as it is still a good hotel, but no longer the best one in Tyler, Texas.
reviews.title: RUDE AND UNPROFESSIONAL

reviews.text: Stayed at this property because we were attending a concert at the Oil Palace. This location is convenient to a lot of restaurants as well as the Oil Palace but we were very disappointed that our room was not ready at 3pm as guaranteed. The front desk host did give us a certificate for an additional 1000 Priority Club points that was very nice. Usually check-in times are not a big deal but because we needed to shower and dress for the concert & leave by 5pm it was a little unsettling to not get in our room until almost 4pm which left little time to relax from being on the road and then get ready for the night. The room seemed overly crowded and I bumped into the chair that was at the desk on the way from the bathroom several times.. the chair was way too big for the desk & the space between the desk & bed. I have stayed in other Holiday Inn Express & Suites that were much bigger & nicer & don't think this room could be called a suite. The free breakfast is always a welcome from Holiday Inn Express hotels & it had the standard food but the attendant was very conscientious in her job made sure everything was well stocked & clean. Might try the Staybridge Suites down the road if we every come back to Tyler but this hotel would do again also if we had no other choice.
reviews.title: Very Good / Economic

reviews.text: I'm a platinum member with Holiday Prioroty Club and stay in a hotel abut 300 nights year and I've never been treated like this. On my second night here at about 9:00 PM the front desk calls me and tells me they need a credit card for incidentals. First I have two yes two business cards on file with Prioroty club and at all IHG i have stayed at I have never been asked for a personal card for incidentals. So I gave my personal debit card to them when they called the second night they told me my personal credit card was declined (rather strange as I used it all over town with no problems used it 30 minutes earlier for dinner) and I needed to come to the desk immediate and give $20 on a credit card for incidentals. This hotel has no bar no restaurant NOTHING like this all they have is a suite shop for snack I don't use there suite shop due to prices to high. I had advised the person I was not coming back down that night and I could take care of it on Sat. They continued to argue with me finally I hung up the phone. Then bright and early the next morning 8:00 am I got another call insisting I come down to pay a $100 cash deposit for incidentals. REALLY $100 for SNACK ARE YOU CRAZY and cash when I have TWO credit cards on file. I insisted that the manger call me in regards to this matter and guess who calls me. The director os sales yes the director of sales finally I was so frustrated mchecked out of this hotel AND I WILL NEVER STAY HERE AGAIN. I moved to another IHG property much newer and
reviews.title: Courteous & Compassionate Staff

reviews.text: I travel for bs constantly and prefer HI express, but this one is way over price. The lighting in the room is poor, the carpets and floors and flithy. The free internet requires sign on every 15 min., As for requests, I carry confidential documents for bs. I was very specific about no one (cleaning or otherwise) in my room unless I am present. They went in anyway. Their pricing is ridiculous in comparison to other HI express I stay in. They claim are in line with the area market, not! My colleagues have more amentities and better accommodations and pay way less. I can't recommend this and will never be stupid enough to pay these outrageous prices again! This one will be the exception to my preference when on bs. here! Too bad!
reviews.title: No, No, No, save your money!

reviews.text: FYI - I had to leave a review on this site due to this location not letting me create a account! Hummm! I don't wonder why!
reviews.title: The Best To Work With

reviews.text: Holiday Inn Express
reviews.title: A Light in the darkness

reviews.text: 2421 E. S.E. Loop 323
reviews.title: The stay was incredible and the people were very polite and curtieous. I will be back here again.

reviews.text: Tyler, TX 75701
reviews.title: Customer Service
Excellent room and staff
reviews.text: Staff very friendly and accommodating. Booked room on web and made special request which was surprisingly fulfilled. Room large, CLEAN and very comfortable. Will definitely stay here each time I visit Tyler, TX.

Very polite and clean. Good location; ren -reasonable $.stayed one night.Wonderfull complimentary breakfast.Close to loop that will get you anywhere in Tyler. Good firm bed instead of stupid pillowtop!
reviews.title: Very nice place to stay

reviews.text: Would recommend this hotel to any one ; no one stared angrily at my child -and the pool looks delightfully although its December and kinda cold!
reviews.title: Great Comfort

reviews.text: Great experience! It all started from the warm and friendly greeting from the staff. They are also helpful with directions. It's a very clean and quite place. The rooms and beds are very comfortable. There are several good resturants nearby. The breakfast was good. From fresh made pancakes to fruit and other usual offerings. The business in handy and useful. The wireless internet was fast. Be careful - there are two HI Expresses in Tyler. This one is tops!!
reviews.title: Better of the Two Holiday Inn Express Hotels in Tyler

reviews.text: Stayed here with my extended family for my nieces graduation from Van High School. Clean, nice hotel for the price with a free breakfast. Very good location on the nice side of Tyler close to TJC and UT Tyler. AC had a hard time keeping the upstairs rooms cool. I will definitely stay here again when my younger nieces and nephews graduate.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel, a must use!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent the Labor Day weekend here and loved it!
reviews.title: Nicest of this Chain in Tyler

reviews.text: I am a Priority Club Platinum member so I stay in a lot of IHG properties. The Tyler Holiday Inn Express is among my favorites. Taylor at the front desk recognized my PC status and upgraded me to a suite. It was perfect. Thanks again Taylor!
reviews.title: Our Home in Tyler

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We travel to Tyler several times a year and find the Holiday Inn on E SE Loop 323 to be comfortable and affordable place to stay. It is easy to find and is close to downtown and the mall... which makes you close to Broadway and all of the good places to eat in Tyler. The receptionists were friendly and the place was very clean.
reviews.title: Great service, great price!

reviews.text: I would love to see them put a charging station in so I could bring our electric car on the next trip.
reviews.title: Appreciation & thanks...

reviews.text: My wife and I celebrated our first anniversary this week and were unfortunately both stuck working the day of our anniversary. In an attempt to make the day special and memorable, I called up the Holiday Inn Express on the loop between our jobs. They showed me both of their available suites and let me choose which one I preferred then also price matched the suite with one of my travel rewards cards. The staff was friendly and responsive and allowed me to check in on my lunch break to decorate the room for that night. The pool area offers a decent pool for swimming and wading, a fairly large hot tub and a sauna. The "mini-suites" on the fourth floor offer a very nice two person jacuzzi and a large comfortable king bed. I was very pleased with our stay and will definitely use them again.
reviews.title: Scrappy Quilters Group

aka: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Tyler South Hotel
description: Welcome to the Holiday Inn Express Tyler South.Our award-winning hotel near the University of Texas-Tyler is within minutes of the Tyler Pounds Regional Airport and downtown Tyler. The Holiday Inn Express South provides easy access to major Tyler attractions and businesses.Leisure guests will find that our East Texas hotel near Tyler State Park and the Discovery Science Place is the perfect place to stay. Less than five miles from our exceptional accommodations, visitors can observe wildlife at the Caldwell Zoo, tour the historic McClendon House, attend a concert at the Cowan Center or visit the Tyler Municipal Rose Gardens.Convenient for business travelers, our premier lodging is near corporate offices such as Sandrill Inc., Delek Refining Ltd., Suddenlink, Trane and CB & I Howe-Baker. The Harvey Hall Convention Center is located two miles from our Tyler accommodations. Tyler Junior College, Trinity Mother Francis and East Texas Medical Center are also nearby. Additionally, we provide free high-speed, wireless and wired Internet access for your convenience.While lodging in Tyler, Texas, be sure to enjoy our smoke-free hotel's choice amenities. We have a complimentary hot breakfast bar and an indoor pool with a whirlpool and sauna. Our Tyler hotel also has a well-equipped fitness center, convenience store and newsstand, a shoe-shine station and self-laundry services. We hope you will stay at our award winning property during your vacation.
